nodes.text: The Imperial Outpost DNT-X004 was an Imperial recon base on the planet Dantooine during the Dantooine Incursion.

Imperial Outpost DNT-X004 was an outpost of the reconstituted Sith Empire on Dantooine. It was hidden in a cave strategically located near the Banir Regional Energy Complex. The location proved to be a perfect launchpad for strikes on Republic infrastructure. The Imperials and Sith operated with a minimum of staff and materiel.
